listing.listing_description:
Baan Chang is the most expansive and exclusive of the six stunning villas that make up the Dhevatara Cove Estate on Koh Samui’s secluded eastern shore. This five bedroom, private beachfront residence is nestled into a tranquil cove with mature, tended tropical gardens that extend through the ample grounds and open onto an undisturbed stretch of sandy beach. Lose yourself in this Thai oasis!

With tall French windows in every room sliding open to welcome in the soothing views and peaceful island surroundings, Baan Chang blurs borders when it comes to indoor/outdoor living. The villa’s huge private pool offers a constant, easily enjoyed opportunity to cool off, with plenty of cushioned sun loungers on the deck for relaxing days on the sun terrace or reclining in comfort on the beach. Your spacious villa includes a television, DVD player, music system, Wi-Fi, internal garden, hot tub, beachside terrace, outdoor speakers and a two-person kayak. Your staff, including a housekeeper, Thai chef and manager, are there to ensure a hassle free visit.

High, pinnacled ceilings in the living and bedroom pavilions, along with a liberal use of top quality natural materials and an abundance of Thai silk also lend the villa a strong sense of exoticism. Despite an atmosphere of royal antiquity, Baan Chang is also a very modern holiday villa, fitted with the latest home technology and furnished throughout with unique pieces like the impressive, circular dark wood table in the dining room and the huge sofa-daybed in the lounge poised in front of an LED Smart TV.

With a total of five bedrooms, Villa Baan Chang can accommodate up to ten guests. Each bedroom includes a fluffy double bed and en-suite bathroom. All the spacious en-suite bedrooms open onto meditative ocean or garden views and also boast indulgent bathtubs for the ultimate private soak.

The name Chang means elephant in Thai and the kingdom’s famous royal beast is beautifully represented throughout the property, from the giant statues in the garden at the entrance to delightful, hand-painted sliding doors on the television cabinet in the lounge. With beachside access to Lipa Noi, one of the most spectacular beaches in Thailand, the bounty of the tropics are right at your door. Enjoy the luxury of Koh Samui at Villa Baan Chang!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The turquoise pool seems to spill into the jewel-toned sea from this contemporary villa on the shores of Koh Samui. One of the only private homes amid luxury boutique hotels, it has eclectic pieces that feel like a well-traveled friend’s. Sip drinks while watching the sunset, from the rooftop or only a few steps away from honeymoon-favorite Bophut Beach, and shop and snack at the Friday-night market in Fisherman’s Village. 

Listen to the waves lap at the shore from the loungers around the infinity pool, and heat up the barbecue for dinner at the alfresco table as the sky turns brilliant shades of pink, orange, and purple at sunset. The beachfront location means you need only cross a palm-dotted lawn to put your toes in the sand. 

Open the doors fronting this vacation rental to let the breeze waft over an all-white sitting area, glass-topped dining table for 6, and a sleek, fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, whose turquoise tiles match the water outside. 

The villa’s 5 bedrooms are their own airy retreats; one even has its own terrace and plunge pool overlooking the ocean. 

A holiday at the villa puts you on Bophut Beach, a family-friendly stretch where you can play in the water, taste Thailand in street-food stalls or gourmet restaurants, and finish the day with a casual beer or a breathtaking fire show. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Savor stunning views from sunrise to sunset from gorgeous Villa Ella. Perched in the quiet hills overlooking Chaweng Bay, this beautifully designed Koh Samui vacation rental commands vistas of brilliant blue ocean—and offers a location close to beaches, shopping and dining. Its four bedrooms and attentive staff means you can invite up to eight friends or family members for a pampering tropical holiday.

Your stay at Villa Ella begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a villa manager, chef and two full-time staff. Take in the views from expansive outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, plenty of loungers, a barbecue and a hot tub. After sunset, flip on the smart TV and Bluetooth sound system or share photos of your day via Wi-Fi.

Of course, it’s also easy to enjoy the views from the villa’s double-height great room, which is fronted by a wall of glass. Stretch out in the sitting areas on the first floor or climb the staircase to the dining area on the second level. Though chef service is included in your stay, there’s also a sleek fully equipped kitchen near the dining table.

All four bedrooms at this luxury property are honeymoon-suite-inspired retreats with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans; two of the bedrooms also open to private balconies. The glass-walled bathrooms mean you can even look out over the ocean while you’re in the bathtub.

Villa Ella is a short drive from the popular beaches at Chaweng, Bophut and Maenam, where you can play in the water or while away the afternoon at a laid-back oceanfront bar. It’s also a short drive from downtown Chaweng and shopping and dining in downtown Bophut. Avid players won’t want to miss the chance to play a round at nearby Santiburi Golf Course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The largest of three magnificent villas that make up the Sangsuri Estate on Koh Samui, Villa 1 is an expansive, seven bedroom property built over a series of landscaped terraces that step down to an undisturbed stretch of beach just north of Chaweng. With its dramatic sloping cliff side location, the architect creates a supremely comfortable and luxurious tropical retreat that is essentially a private resort, perfect for groups or families. Your dream villa awaits!

Villa Sangsuri 1 is an extravagant villa hidden away in a stunning, peaceful beachside location. Guests can enjoy every possible private amenity and intelligent designs mean large groups have an appealing blend of communal and private spaces to explore. A high wall at one end features a built-in projector screen so the garden can be transformed into an outdoor cinema. Days turn into nights while lazing by the pool or on the beach, the day punctuated by alfresco meals prepared to order by the villa’s private chef.

The villa’s chic, contemporary design scheme is nicely balanced against a more rustic feeling that includes thatched-roof bedroom pavilions and shuttered bathrooms. A harmonious balance is easily achieved between indoor and outdoor living as you wander between the various spaces that make up this expansive residence. The generous, furnished, open plan lounge and dining space folds open onto a fabulous pool and steps lead down to the soft Samui sand.

The villa’s multiple levels house comfortable bedroom pavilions with private sky gardens and sun terraces, all of which draw in calming views of the ocean and a picturesque, uninhabited island known as Koh Matlang. The upper floor is home to a spacious and colorful children’s dorm with comfortable, contemporary bunk beds. With a total of seven bedrooms, this villa can accommodate up to twelve adults and eight children.

Villa 1 at Sangsuri Estate is perfect for weddings, anniversary gatherings, parties or just as the ideal place to spend quality time with friends or family in the comfort of a superlative beachfront villa. The sheer lavish quality and exquisite design have made this luxury villa one of the island’s top choices for family holiday villas and professional retreats alike. Let you and your entourage be serenaded by the sound of the gentle sea at Sangsuri Estate and emerge refreshed and rejuvenated like never before.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Panoramic views of Koh Samui’s lush canopy await at this modern hilltop home. Wake up early to catch the sunrise from the sunken lounge alongside the pool on the terrace. Sip your morning coffee while you lay back in a sun lounger, then join the group inside for breakfast. When you’re ready to explore, start with the food stands, shops, and bars at the street market in Fisherman’s Village.

Floor-to-ceilings windows connect the terrace and living room, opening the interior to natural sunlight and the fresh hillside breeze. Creamy, white walls set a soothing tone while acting as a canvas for Shyamala’s collection of Thai art. The majority of the interior decor is modern-contemporary, with a few mid-century modern pieces to add that calming retro vibe. After dinner in the formal dining area, mix up a cocktail at the wet bar, and organize a pool tournament. Later, move the party outside to the pool. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the home gym is ready when you are.

Grab your camera and head out to snap a few pictures at Koh Samui’s most celebrated temples. Big Buddha, Wat Khunaram, and Wat Plai Laem are all within driving distance.

If you’re in the mood to shop, The Wharf Samui and Bophut Plaza are perfect for souvenirs, as well as designer fashion. And at night, head to Chaweng for a vast selection of beachfront bars and buzzing nightclubs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step onto the pristine sands of Natai Beach from this contemporary double-villa on Phuket’s west coast. Host a ceremony beside the Andaman Sea, and marvel at the sunset after a home-catered meal. Built in 2017, this fully staffed vacation rental consists of 2 linked houses, ideal for multiple families or destination wedding guests. Experience some of the finest golf and watersports in Thailand nearby, or catch a ferry from Khao Lak to the sublime Similan Islands.

Each of the 5-bedroom houses is centered around an open-concept living/dining room with gourmet kitchen. Vaulted ceilings, luminous clerestory windows, and retractable walls create breezy and light-filled spaces. The twin infinity pools yield to a lush lawn before the beach, and beside each pool is an open-air pavilion gazing out to sea. Embark by kayak over the shimmering expanse or take the villa’s bicycles out for a ride. Savor an in-house massage and learn the secrets of Thai cuisine from your private chef. 

The west coast of Phuket offers an extraordinary array of activities and adventures for families, sporting enthusiasts, and nature lovers. In addition to the Similan Islands, you’re within easy reach of Ao Phang Nga National Park, where you’ll discover waterfall pools, myriad monkeys, unique sea life, and the limestone towers of James Bond Island. The renowned championship golf courses at Blue Canyon and Katathong are both within a half-hour’s drive of the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Steal away to one of the most secluded corners of Koh Samui at The Headland Villa 5. Part of the exclusive Headland, this beautifully appointed vacation rental puts you close to the picturesque Baan Taling Ngam and quiet Lamai Beach. Reserve its four bedrooms for a tropical getaway with family, a holiday in the sun with friends or even an indulgent island honeymoon.

Not only does the villa offer outdoor living areas with an infinity pool and lounge furniture, it boasts private access to a beach. Inside, its suite of high-tech amenities ranges from satellite television and a DVD player and Wi-Fi. A concierge, villa manager and housekeeper will ensure your comfort during your stay.

Fold-away glass walls link the outdoor living areas to the bright, open-plan interiors. Settle in to one of the sectionals in the living room and let the warm breezes waft over you, or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen to recount the day’s adventures. A separate television lounge is the perfect place for kids to play while grown-ups prep dinner or catch up.

This luxury property has two bedrooms with double beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All but one of the twin bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and all four bedrooms have air conditioning.

The Headland Villa 5 is a 5-minute walk from the Baan Sabai Resort and Spa, and a 5-minute drive from the ferry and the famed Five Islands restaurant. While it’s within walking distance of a rocky beach, it’s also within a 16 km drive of quiet Lamai Beach if you’d like to swim. Be sure to set aside a morning to explore the town of Nathon, 11 km away by car, where you’ll find an assortment of shops, eateries and coffee spots offering products and treats that you can only find on Koh Samui.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Note: This villa can be rented in conjunction with other villas.

listing.listing_description:
Follow the sun on a beach holiday at Baan Tawantok Villa 1. Set on the picture-perfect shores of Lipa Noi Beach, this Koh Samui vacation rental will tempt you to spend days by the water and evenings watching the sunset over the sea. A full staff and five bedrooms can accommodate up to ten guests in tropical luxury.

Your stay at the villa begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a chef, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as continental breakfast each day. Make the most of the warm weather and gorgeous setting in outdoor living areas with space for lounging and dining, a barbecue and an oceanfront pool, plus a shared tennis court. In the evenings, unwind in front of the satellite television or share photos with friends and family back home via Wi-Fi.

The villa’s bright, breezy interiors feature an open-concept layout and high ceilings. It’s easy to gather everyone in the living and dining areas in the great room, and a fully equipped kitchen makes meal preparation a snap. Open the sliding glass doors to let in the sea breezes, or close them on the hottest days and flip on the air conditioning instead.

Relive your honeymoon in the incredible master suite at Baan Tawantok Villa 1, which has a king bed, lounge area and ocean views. There are three other bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds; all five have private en-suite bathrooms and outdoor showers. For larger parties, there is a mezzanine area in the master bedroom with an additional queen bed.

Having tranquil Lipa Noi Beach just in front of the villa means it couldn’t be simpler to spend a day on the sand. For a great brunch or a fun night out, you can also make the short drive to Nikki Beach. Sample more dining options or shop for unique souvenirs in downtown Nathon, just a bit farther down the coast.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The View earns its title with perhaps the finest ocean prospect along the west coast of Koh Samui. Built gracefully into a lush hillside at Taling Ngam above a dreamy cove and private beach, the stunning modern home surveys panoramic vistas of the Gulf of Thailand and the Five Islands. The villa features five spacious bedroom suites in addition to the kids' bunk room that can accommodate up to 6 children. The villa offers the ideal accommodations for families or destination wedding guests. An extraordinary private staff includes a villa manager, concierge, and Thai chef, and complimentary continental breakfast and airport transfer are provided.

The villa's design blurs the line between exterior and interior living, inviting you to long days and evenings amid enchanting breezes and vistas. Soak your body in the bubbling spa and plunge into the saltwater pool. Take a sea kayak onto the water or dive into the luminous waves, and savor the exquisite sunlight on beachside lounge chairs. Kindle the barbecue in the afternoon as the kids play on the ample lawn, and sip refreshments from the lovely poolside bar as the sun approaches the horizon.

The main interior living and dining rooms feature broad, retractable glass walls that form a veranda-like setting with lofty sea views—an ideal theater for experiencing the sublime sunsets of Koh Samui. After relishing a home-catered feast at the superb dining table, return to the living room to watch a favorite film on the large projector screen.

The villa features four bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms, while the children's bunkroom and the bedroom featuring two twin-size beds share a bathroom between them. All of the bedrooms enjoy air conditioning. The four king suites gaze out on stunning ocean views and include high-end entertainment systems, and remote-controlled blinds. Two of the bathrooms feature semi-alfresco bathrooms (one with outdoor shower, one with outdoor bathtub).

Beyond the private paradise of The View, you're within easy reach of some of the finest activities and destinations on the island. Nathon is an easy drive away, where you can catch a ferry to the extraordinary Ang Thong National Marine Park. The vicinity abounds in excellent resorts, spas, watersports, wellness facilities, and family-friendly adventures, including TopCats Freshwater Fishing and Marga Yoga Center.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on one of the most exclusive headlands on Phuket, this villa offers a towering view of the calm blue Andaman sea beyond. The interiors are peerless amongst the Kamala beach villas; spread over two levels with peaceful garden paths and contemplative balconies. Inspired by traditional Thai design, the villa is just a few minutes by car from both the FantaSea cultural park and Patong town.

Villa Talaefun’s position is nothing short of enviable. The villa has been constructed around the unimpeded ocean view. Guests entering the villa are instantly struck by the vertical grandeur of the property, as the pointed Lanna-style roof reaches into the sky. Guests can relax and recline in the sumptuous interiors, replete with masterfully carved furniture, delightfully comfortable furniture, and soft white curtains which can be pulled to create a calm, cool space as the sun dazzles down outside. The artful pathways and walkways of the villa’s gardens and green spaces invite thoughtful walkers, with the outdoor dining area a dream spot for group gatherings at the end of an active day.

Located on the Millionaire’s Mile, the villa is just a handful of minutes from Kamala beach to the north, and just slightly further from Patong Beach to the south, each of which offer broad expanses of tropical sands, shady trees and enjoyable beach bars. Set forth and explore the delights that Phuket island has to offer, from delicious, roadside street food in the local towns, to exciting day-cruises exploring offshore islands and hidden coves. When night falls, guests can take in the moonlit waves and ship lights at sea from the terrace with a cool drink in hand, while planning further trips around this paradise island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take yourself far out of the ordinary at The Aquila. From this luxury villa’s perch above a quiet cove on the Andaman Sea, only one other set of lights is visible at night—the ultimate in a scenic private location. A full staff and the contemporary, Asian-influenced interiors of this vacation rental will ease you into the laid-back Phuket lifestyle in no time.

Your holiday at The Aquila begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, security staff and property manager, making it the perfect destination for a relaxed family getaway or honeymoon away from it all. Spend your time taking in the views—and soaking in the tropical sun—from the expansive outdoor living area, which includes rows of loungers by an infinity pool, shaded sitting and dining areas, and a barbecue. Inside, the property features spa and exercise rooms, a bar and lounge, a sound system, and even a library.

Simple elegance defines the look and feel of the villa’s interiors. Neutral-toned sofas and sectionals, cool charcoal-hued tile floors and walls of windows keep the multiple living rooms refined yet airy, while built-in cabinets add an understated, thoughtful touch to a dining room that seats sixteen. Flat-fronted white cabinets and contrasting black countertops in the fully equipped kitchen are a study in minimalist chic.

The seven bedrooms at The Aquila are split between the guest pavilion and the arrival pavilion; all have en-suite bathrooms, balconies and ocean views. There are six bedrooms in the guest pavilion: four with king beds, lounge areas and al-fresco showers, and two with two twin beds each. The arrival pavilion has one bedroom with a king bed, its own living area and an outdoor shower.

In spite of the villa’s hidden-away location on a quiet cove, it’s only a 10-minute drive from Kamala Beach, known for its beautiful sand and trendy beach clubs. The property is also close to Patong Beach, Surin Beach, FantaSea and even Laguna Golf Phuket. Make the short drive into central Phuket and board an excursion from the Royal Phuket Marina or sample local specialties from the night market.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

With waterfront access to Plai Laem and incredible views of Thailand’s Gulf from nearly every inch, Villa Manta Samui makes the most of its lush, tropical location. The perfect home base for a family getaway, golf trip, or vacation with friends, this luxurious rental features four en-suite bedrooms, all with ocean views, and plenty of thoughtfully designed spaces for group gatherings. Nearby, you’ll find spa facilities, golf, tennis, rain forest, and bustling city life, all yours to discover on your next amazing Luxury Retreat.

Floor-to-ceiling openings stretch the length of Villa Manta Samui’s main living room, inviting the full length of the terrace to expand your tropical social setting, and allowing fresh sea breeze and natural sunlight to fill the villa’s open concept interior. Inside, soothing cream tones, warm wood trim, and bright accents on fabrics and throw pillows combine to create a space that is exciting, relaxing, and elegant, all at the same time. Throughout the villa, you’ll enjoy state of the art appliances and electronics. There’s a fully equipped kitchen, along with formal and alfresco dining for the whole group. And, to provide the perfect backdrop for any occasion, you’ll have amazing ocean views.

On the terrace, you’ll love lounging by the infinity pool and relaxing in the spa, while you gaze upon the Gulf of Thailand. Inside, you’ll appreciate features like smart television, the pool table, Wi-Fi, the sound system, air conditioning, and more.

Down on Plai Laem, your own little sandy shoreline, you’ll find two kayaks to help with your aquatic exploration of Koh Samui. If you’d like to visit some of the other beaches in the area, you’ll find four more ranging from a few hundred meters to three-kilometers away. If there’s a golfer in the group, Bohput Hills and Santiburi Samui golf courses are two of the best in the area; both are just a few minute drives. And, if it’s shopping, dining, and nightlife you’re looking for, head to Plai Laem’s vibrant Main Street, just nine-kilometers from Villa Manta Samui.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
It doesn’t get any better than true-beachfront, especially along the sandy and secluded shores of Laem Sor Bay, Thailand. From the sea to the pool, to the living room couch, barrier-free, in a matter of seconds, that’s how the open-air Villa Suma celebrates Koh Samui’s beautiful beach environment. With six en-suite king bedrooms, all with an ocean view, this balmy beach house is perfect for a family getaway or vacation with friends. There is also a seventh bedroom that is great for kids. And nearby, you’ll find golf, rainforest, and shopping, restaurants, and nightlife seven miles away on Main Street.

With the smoothest transition imaginable, Villa Suma’s open concept interior spills out to the beachfront terrace, creating the perfect setting for a relaxing beach vacation. Inside, white walls act as a canvas for rich wood tones and ocean-inspired turquoise accent pieces. The kitchen, dining area, and lounge, adorned with designer furniture and high-end electronics, blend into a spacious great room, ideal for social occasions and group gatherings.

Villa Suma’s beachfront estate is decorated with sun loungers, a hammock, outdoor living and dining areas, a refreshing infinity swimming pool, and lush tropical greenery. To make your stay even more relaxing, Suma comes with housekeeping, airport transfer, and a private chef. And, inside, features like Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and formal dining for ten make sure your stay is cool and comfortable.

Finding the beach couldn’t be easier at Villa Suma, but if you’d like to visit a more populated stretch of sand, Nikki and Lamai beaches are both favorites among locals and return visitors, and they’re just a few minutes from home. If there’s a golfer in your group, Royal Samui Golf Club is a scenic nine-hole that runs along the coast for spectacular ocean views and challenging fairways. And, if you’d like to learn about Thailand's local flora and fauna, Na Muang Safari Park is perfect for an afternoon excursion.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Double your tropical fun at Tawantok Beach Estate. This beautiful Koh Samui vacation rental is made up of two separate villas that can be reserved independently or booked as one ten-bedroom luxury property for up to twenty guests. An oceanfront setting on quiet Lipa Noi Beach and a full staff round out its charms.

Your holiday at Tawantok Beach Estate includes the services of a private Chef, Villa Manager and housekeeper, as well as continental breakfast each day. Each of the property’s two villas has an infinity pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas and a barbecue, and they share a tennis court. The indoor amenities at each house range from a satellite television to Wi-Fi.

The open-plan layouts of the estate’s two houses makes it easy to gather with friends and family. In each, you’ll find a great room with a spacious sitting area, a dining area for twelve and a fully equipped kitchen. Open the glass sliding doors to let the sea breezes waft through the great room, or close them and flip on the air conditioning to keep it comfortable.

Each house at Tawantok Beach Estate has four bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with a lounge area and ocean views, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All ten bedrooms have honeymoon-suite-inspired features such as alfresco showers in the ensuite bathrooms. For larger parties, an additional queen bed is available on the mezzanine level of each master suite.

Spend your stay strolling the white sands or splashing in the turquoise waters on tranquil Lipa Noi Beach, just in front of the villa, or make the short drive to the livelier scene at Nikki Beach, where you can sit down to a great brunch or make it a fun evening out. Ferry access is also a short drive away, as are dining and souvenir shopping in downtown Nathon.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

See Koh Samui from a property unlike any other at Villa ONE. Whether you’re taking a honeymoon-style getaway with your one and only or a tropical holiday with friends and family, this spectacular vacation rental delivers chic accommodations, stunning views over Chaweng Bay and a location close to beaches and Bophut. Its attentive staff and five bedrooms are ready to pamper parties of up to ten guests.

Your stay at this luxury property begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a villa manager, chef and two full-time staff members. After the daily breakfast, put a playlist on the outdoor sound system and stretch out in a lounger by the infinity pool, keep up with your routine in the exercise room or challenge everyone at the pool table. There’s also a home theater, Apple TV, indoor sound system and even a piano.

Sliding glass walls mean the views are just as incredible from the indoor living spaces as from the outdoor ones. A water feature, polished stone floors and sleek furnishings lend a cool, contemporary vibe to the open-concept living and dining areas. Though chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

All five bedrooms at Villa ONE have king beds, private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans. The master suite also has its own jetted tub, lounge area and furnished terrace, and several other bedrooms open to balconies.

Villa ONE is just a short drive from the popular beaches at Chaweng and Bophut, putting you within easy reach of the island’s famously beautiful waters and lively beachfront bars, perfect for whiling away an afternoon. It’s also a short drive from the nearest grocery store in Chaweng, plus more shopping and dining options in downtown Bophut.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Phuket's Andara Villa seventeen is the perfect vacation destination for large families, and groups of friends and colleagues. With it's seven spacious en-suite bedrooms and private atmosphere, this luxurious villa is ideal for a golf trip, corporate retreat, or family reunion. And, with Phuket's wide range of activities and attractions, all within thirty kilometers, you'll have plenty of beaches, golf courses, shopping centers, and historical sites to visit on your next Luxury Retreats vacation.

Villa Andara Seventeen's decor features an eclectic mixture of traditional Thai statues, ornate detailing, an extensive color palette, and modern designer furniture. With plenty of warm wood textures and numerous openings to beautiful natural surroundings, this villa has a welcoming open-air atmosphere that allows the interior to merge seamlessly with the terrace. In the kitchen, it's all modern with state of the art appliances, granite countertops, and a bright, social ambiance.

Magnificent ocean views provide the perfect background for an amazing Thai dinner prepared by the included private chef. All you'll have to do is decide whether to eat in the formal area inside, or under the alfresco dining pavilion on the terrace. After dinner, spend your night relaxing in one of the outdoor lounge areas by the pool, sharing a bottle from the wine fridge, and watching as the sun disappears into the horizon. Or, maybe you'd rather spend the evening inside, making use of the Wi-Fi, air conditioning, satellite television, and entertainment room.

The nearest beachfront is just a few minutes away on the sandy shores of Kamala Beach. This quiet bay is known as one of the most beautiful places in Phuket with an endless stretch of white sand and lush forested hills surrounding its calm waters. If there's a golfer or two in the group, they're in luck, as Thailand is known for its incredibly scenic courses, three of which are within twenty-five kilometers. And, the city center of Phuket is nearby as well, where you'll find Jungceylon Shopping Centre, Talad Kaset Night Market, and plenty of authentic Thai cuisine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tropical sunshine glitters on the infinity pool—and actually powers this eco-friendly villa on the Phuket coast that’s only accessible by boat. Manicured gardens define your own little world, double-height ceilings invite light into the sleek interiors, and a full staff provides an all-inclusive-style stay. Golf-cart down to the 110-meter white-sand beach to swim, snorkel, kayak, or even fish. 

This luxury property is as well appointed as a resort, with an infinity pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas, a barbecue, tennis and bocce courts, plus mountain bikes, kayaks, and snorkel and fishing gear. Stretch out in the indoor exercise room or get a massage from the in-house therapist before challenging friends and family at the pool table, shaking up a cocktail at the wet bar, and watching a movie in the media room. 

The more than 26,000 square feet of living space at this vacation rental are centered on a two-story great room anchored by four imposing beams and a mobile-style work of art. The high-contrast look of dark wood against cream furniture continues in the TV room, dining area for 12, and the fully equipped kitchen. 

Each of the villa’s 6 bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area, and a terrace or balcony. After a day out in the warm Thailand sun, flip on the air conditioning and sip a beverage from each bedroom’s mini-refrigerator. 

You’ll need to take a boat to access this incredibly private corner of the Tambon Thep Krasatti area at the start of your holiday, but once you’ve arrived, a golf cart makes it easy to get around. If you’d like to see more of Phuket, ask the concierge and chauffeur to arrange a visit to Naithon Beach, the Laguna Phuket Golf Club, or the Banyan Tree Spa. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that these rates are dynamic. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialist for the best available rate.

This magnificent, six-bedroom villa is located within Layan Residences by Anantara, a luxury resort community on the west coast of Phuket Island. The expansive, 2,600-square-meter home is just a minute on foot from Layan Beach and offers extraordinary features for private enjoyment, including a twenty-one-meter infinity swimming pool, alfresco dining, an in-villa massage room, high-end technology for cooking and entertainment, and butler services. Guests additionally enjoy access to the superb amenities and activities of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort. The stunning design of the two-story home balances contemporary comforts with traditional Thai influences, most visible in the classic dining sala. Its six bedrooms (including dual master suites) accommodate up to fourteen guests.

The villa enjoys a lofty position amid the lush coastal hills, with breathtaking views of Layan Bay and the sublime sunsets of Phuket. Savor a morning swim in the blue-tiled pool, and bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs beneath rustling palms. Relish alfresco meals in the sala, and settle into the comfortable lounge for evening cocktails amid enchanting torch light.

High ceilings and ample glass walls infuse the home with exquisite light and air. The living room features comfortable sofas and a TV beside a small dining table, while the separate dining room includes a circular, sea-view table for eight served by an open, fully equipped kitchen. Soft tones, natural wood accents, and beautiful touches of local artistry and tradition create a serene yet inspiring ambiance.

The villa features two master suites, each with a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with rain shower and bathtub. Three of the guest suites feature king beds and one has a pair of double beds, and all enjoy ensuite bathrooms.

Beyond your private haven, you'll enjoy easy access to Layan Beach and the resort's world-class offerings, including fine restaurants, a fitness center, a kids' club, , a tennis court, and Anantara Spa. The resort also includes a chapel and forms a fabulous venue for weddings. Proximity to Phuket International Airport ensures convenience for families and destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Baan Kilee is a delightful beachfront villa on Lipa Noi Beach, along the west coast of Koh Samui. An ideal resort-alternative for families, the home features three swimming pools (including two kids' pools), a sea-kayak, a playground, beachfront dining, and a children's playroom that can be converted into a kids' bedroom. The talented and attentive staff includes a personal Thai chef and a villa manager.

The home is perfectly designed to optimize its seaside position and panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand. An expansive infinite pool of beautiful blue tile extends along the edge of the beach, inviting you to savor a delicious plunge or bask in the sun's rays on semi-submerged lounge chairs. Between the pool and the beach is a lovely dining table, an enchanting venue for home-catered feasts in the ocean breeze. Sip evening cocktails at the poolside bar and marvel at the sunset from the lip of the sea.

A gorgeous grass courtyard extends from the pool toward the main pavilion, creating a lovely cloistered ambiance bathed in ocean air The main dining room features an open wall and expansive views, its table accompanied by a pair of stunning bed swings and exquisite Buddhist décor. The neighboring home theater is ideal for family movie night.

The villa's superb bedrooms provide dreamy private havens infused with the sounds of waves and swaying palms. There are four king suites (one of which includes two children's beds as well), one suite with a pair of single beds, and a playroom suite with three single beds. All of the rooms feature ensuite bathrooms, and five include satellite televisions. There are two additional loft sleeping spaces accessible by ladder.

Beyond the private paradise of Baan Kilee, you're about ten minutes from the town of Nathon, where you can catch a boat for a daytrip to Angthong National Marine Park. The neighboring inland forests include the enchanting Buddhist sites of Wat Kiri Wongkaram, Wat Sila Ngu, and Secret Buddha Garden, as well as the beautiful Hin Lat Waterfall. Santiburi Golf Course is about forty minutes to the north.

listing.listing_description:
From bed to the beach in seconds, this traditional Thai villa in Lipa Noi loves showing off its pristine environment. Follow pathways through gardens and water features to the sand. Sit and read beneath the shade of a palm tree. Then, join the group inside for dinner, prepared by a private chef. If you’d prefer to dine out, head to Nathon for dinner at a beachfront restaurant or bar.

Walk the dark wood planked pool deck to find the perfect spot to work on your tan. Calm yourself with an afternoon yoga session on the sandy beachfront. Or, drift in and out of sleep while you sway in the hammock. From the peaks of extra-high ceilings to the stone-tiled floors, the vibe at Baan Tao Talay is all about relaxation and the celebration of Thailand’s environment. On wilder nights, turn up the sound system and mix a few tropical cocktails to enjoy in the beachfront gazebo. Unwind and enjoy the sunset while the full-staff takes care of everything else.

Start your trip with a visit to Fisherman’s Village, where you can stock up on fresh local foods at the outdoor market. If you save the trip for later in the day, you can stop for dinner at one of their fantastic seafood restaurants. After dinner, do a little bar hopping or dance the night away in Chaweng, the island’s nightlife capital. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you’ve been looking for the beachfront escape of your dreams, simply make the 25 minute drive from the Phuket airport to Coastal Escape. This incredible luxury vacation rental offers an unparalleled location on Natai Beach, stylish and spacious living areas, and impeccable service and amenities. Book the five bedrooms for the ultimate family holiday or a tropical getaway with friends.

The villa’s private oceanfront living areas, from sitting and dining areas to an infinity pool and outdoor bar, make it easy to take in the panoramic Andaman Sea views.

The clean exterior lines and sliding glass walls lead to gorgeously designed, mod-inspired interiors. An L-shaped great room frames the pool terrace, offering ocean views from the living room, dining room and kitchen. The separate lounge area has the same flair—think plush area rugs, tufted seating and neutral tones peppered with colorful accents—but is a more intimate space for watching TV or using the Wi-Fi.

This villa has four bedrooms with king beds, lounge areas, and access to a terrace or balcony: three with ocean views and one with garden views. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and garden views. All five bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms — and the same contemporary take on mid-century style as the great room.

Spend your stay indulging in wellness and massage treatments in the villa’s own massage room or reliving your honeymoon with a hand-in-hand stroll along Natai Beach. If you’d like to see more of the area, drive into central Phuket or the nearby Sirinat National Park, ask staff to assist in reserving a tee time at the nearest golf course, or visit one of the three other beaches within day-trip distance.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This incredibly spacious four bedroom is the perfect host for your next beach getaway, corporate retreat, or special social event. Located one kilometer east of Surin’s beautiful beach, Shambala Villa enjoys a scenic ocean view and a prime location. And, even with these luxuries, Shambala doesn’t sacrifice any of its privacy. Nearby, you’ll find golf, shopping, dining, nightlife, and gorgeous beachfront, all within a short drive.

Each of Shambala’s spacious bedrooms come with a king sized bed, an en-suite bathroom, and access to the balcony on the top floor. Below, you’ll truly be wowed by the amount of open concept hosting space, all of which merges seamlessly with the pool deck and terrace, where you’ll find even more furnished lounge area. The warm wood color scheme is both welcoming and elegant. After exploring Shambala, it becomes obvious that no expense was spared when decorating the interior with top of the line appliances, electronics, and designer furniture. With its lush property, indoor/outdoor lifestyle, and beautiful Thai architecture, Shamabala shows its guests exactly why Phuket is a premier destination for the most discerning luxury travelers.

Shambala Villa features formal and alfresco dining options, as well as a fully equipped kitchen, and a barbecue on the terrace. On hotter days, you’ll appreciate the villa’s air conditioning, or you could head out to the infinity pool to cool off while you enjoy the ocean view. During your stay, you’ll benefit from a staff that includes a housekeeper, security guard, and property manager. And, there is a lengthy list of extra features that can be added, like chef service, a DJ, yacht charters, and more.

After you’ve spent an afternoon on the sandy shore of Surin Beach, head down the coast to Phuket’s nightlife capital, Bangla Road, where you’ll find a wide range of dining options and a vast amount of bars, nightclubs, and dancehalls. If you’re in the mood to shop, the Boat Avenue Street Mall is just four kilometers from home. And, if you’re a golfer, the Blue Canyon Course was the stage for one of Tiger Wood’s most astonishing comebacks, defeating Ernie Els in a playoff on the final hole.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy all that Phuket has to offer at Baan Laemson 1. Beautifully designed and centrally located, this Kamala vacation rental is the perfect place to while away a sunny day by the pool, or an ideal base for exploring the nearby beaches, including two 2 private beaches, as well as golf courses and other attractions. An attentive staff, luxury amenities and six suite-style bedrooms will ensure the comfort of up to ten friends or family members.

During your holiday, the villa manager, cook and housekeeper will attend to your needs. Spend the days sunbathing on the loungers by the infinity pool, trying out local fare from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining area, and the nights watching the stars come out from the rooftop terrace or watching a favorite movie in the indoor entertainment area.

Designed by an architect who’s worked with the exclusive Aman Resorts Group, Baan Laemson 1 puts a chic modern twist on traditional Thai style. Beneath the villa’s sloping roofs, you’ll find open-plan living spaces with walls of windows framing the views of Kamala Bay and the Andaman Sea. Multiple conversation areas let one group chat while another watches TV, and the formal dining area has room for twelve. There’s even more seating at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, too.

Each of the property’s six bedrooms feels like a private hotel suite, with a double bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and balcony with ocean views. Like the common living areas, the bedrooms’ wood floors and white walls serve as the backdrop for sculptural accent furnishings and unique works of art.

A stone pathway leads from Baan Laemson 1 to a private beach, putting Phuket’s famed turquoise waters within easy reach. It’s just a short drive from the villa to lively Patong beach, the tempting shopping in Phuket Town, and popular Surin Beach, where you can have a casual drink or splurge on a honeymoon-worthy dinner along the oceanfront promenade.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Surrounded by lush tropical greenery and expertly manicured gardens, this five bedroom villa offers the ideal home base for those wishing to celebrate Thailand’s gorgeous natural environment. Perfect for a family getaway or golf vacation with friends, Andara Phuket Villa 16 has spacious areas for group gatherings and plenty of smaller nooks for intimate occasions. Nearby, you’ll have some of Phuket’s most prestigious golf courses, beautiful beaches, ancient temples, and shopping destinations. And, if you’re traveling with kids, Fantasea Theme Park and Phuket Outdoor Adventures are both exciting places to spend an afternoon.

Natural wood and plush seating create a warm, welcoming atmosphere within Andara Phuket Villa 16’s open concept interior. Decorated with traditional, intricate Thai works of art and furniture, you’ll feel instant relaxation upon entering this authentic Thai beach house. And, with so many openings to the terrace, lawns, and balcony, the ocean view, fresh breeze, and natural sunlight of Thailand are ever present.

Andara Phuket Villa 16 comes with a fully equipped kitchen, formal dining for eight, an alfresco dining area, and a chef to prepare daily Thai cuisine for you and your group. Inside, tech features include Wi-Fi, satellite television, a sound system, security, and air conditioning. On the terrace, you’ll love the infinity pool, furnished living spaces, sun beds, and incredible ocean view. And, each bedroom comes with a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom, and an ocean view of its own.

Phuket has some of the most desirable beaches on the planet, and there are plenty of them surrounding Andara Phuket Villa 16. To fully experience the dynamic range of beaches in Thailand, start with Patong and Kamala. With plenty of beachfront bars, restaurants, shops, and a party-atmosphere, Patong Beach is easily the most popular in the area. And, it’s quite close to Bangla Road, Phuket’s nightlife district. On the other end of the spectrum, you have Kamala Beach, a favorite among locals and returning visitors. Kamala Beach is one of Phuket’s best-kept secrets. Surrounded by forested hills, this untouched paradise is perfect for relaxation, family fun, and incredible sunsets.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Laguna Waters is a peaceful, serene vacation home built amongst lush tropical greenery and situated on the edge of a small lake in Phuket’s most upscale beach community, Bang Tao. With luxurious accommodations for ten and plenty of spacious indoor and outdoor areas for guests to explore, this private villa is perfect for a family getaway, island party with friends, or a smaller scale corporate retreat.

Thai architecture is ideal for tranquility and relaxation. Wide doors, across the entire main and upper floor, open to allow the free-flowing natural breeze to fill the interior. Merging of indoor and outdoor spaces, and an open-concept floor plan make Laguna Waters ideal for hosting a social event. Comfortable, designer furniture fills the living room, which leads to the terrace, where you’ll find even more cozy seating. The kitchen has a bright, functional atmosphere with plenty of counter space and high-end stainless steel appliances. Just off the kitchen, the formal dining area seats eight and has three extra spaces at the breakfast bar. There’s also a wine fridge, ice maker, dishwasher, and a Nespresso coffee maker in the fully equipped kitchen.

Although the interior is gorgeous, you’ll probably want to spend a lot of your time soaking up the sun by the swimming pool, hot tub, or from a lounger on the terrace. There’s also an alfresco dining set with seating for ten, should you decide to dine out under the stars. After dinner, grab a bottle of wine and head up to the balcony for a quiet evening looking out over the lake. If you’re feeling more energetic, there’s an exercise room, pool table, bar, and Sonos sound system to keep you entertained through the night. And, Laguna Waters comes with housekeeping, security, and a babysitting service.

Within the Laguna complex, just a few minutes from the villa, you’ll have access to restaurants, shopping, recreational activities, and their spa. There’s also a private beach club with white sandy shores and calm waters, and an eighteen-hole golf course, just minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
